author: hsiaowei
content:
Thank you to <@466006586477772831> , notes from PeerDAS breakout call today:
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Ng2IrCe28kTt1BnIsjtMlKHq2MHgaja24LhFXSvqfJQ/edit?usp=sharing + Zoom chat log + AI summary.

author: hsiaowei
content:
Hey! As I briefly mentioned in today's PeerDAS breakout, <@1010280066028142662> and I recently started to work on improving PeerDAS R&D transparency and communication.

We put some ideas in this doc: https://notes.ethereum.org/@hww/das-acc
Including:
1. Creating a (Peer)DAS Contributor List to enhance collaboration channels and improve transparency across teams.
2. Preparing a PeerDAS Resource Collection and FAQs to provide educational resources for the community.

Hopefully, it will help strengthen PeerDAS readiness and focus efforts on delivering PeerDAS. ðŸ«¶ 

**[ACTION REQUEST] To the generate the (Peer)DAS contributor list, please help fill in this form: https://forms.gle/tt1L2QvSq3JnKPoW7**

Thank you for your time!
